summary: Successfully implemented the comprehensive text wrap specification for canvas-based spreadsheet. Added advanced features including: greedy line-breaking with grapheme clusters using Intl.Segmenter, auto-height row resizing based on wrapped content, layout caching for performance, enhanced Wolf Table integration with custom cell renderer, improved WrapText button with proper cell styling and row height management. The implementation follows the exact specification provided, including proper cascade handling, RTL support preparation, and optimized rendering pipeline.
